description: Introducing the NEW, Light Heavyweight champ of the WHA (World Hoody Association). Ditch that old team hoody and represent yourself with the KÜHL SPEKTER™ Full Zip (FZ) Hoody. Exclusive materials and a high-tech design transcend the average to the extraordinary. Experience the elevated warmth and comfort of a hoody that has been engineered to be lighter and softer than traditional cotton. The SPEKTER, it's a win by knockout.
name: Kuhl Spekter Full Zip Hoody - Mens
